title: Shot at Love
description: Everyone needs rules to live by, but are they worth giving up your one shot at love? Luc didn’t mean to fall for his teammate’s little sister. He had no intention of breaking the guy sisters were strictly off limits. Luc knew that breaking the rule could not only destroy a friendship but derail his career. And he didn’t think her brother was bluffing. As soon as Luc found out the gorgeous brunette he’d been eyeing turned out to be his goalie’s sister, he hit the brakes. But then she said those four little I don’t date athletes. Challenge accepted. Now Luc couldn’t get Kassie out of his mind. She was turning his world upside down. This girl was the Juliet to his Romeo, the jelly to his peanut butter, the queen to his king. But how could he prove to her that his reputation was a thing of the past? He was ready to do anything in his power to change her mind. He only hoped her brother didn’t kill him in the process.
author: Melody Heck Gatto
